last_episode_to_air.name: Unstoppable Chapter 7
last_episode_to_air.overview: The X-Men find that they are more than Astonishing..they are UNSTOPPABLE!

name: Astonishing X-Men
overview: An alien species attempts to take over earth, but the X-Men are ready for anything.

seasons.name: Gifted
seasons.overview: Cyclops and Emma Frost re-form the X-Men with the express purpose of "astonishing" the world. But when breaking news regarding a cure to the mutant gene unexpectedly hits the airwaves, will it derail their new plans before they even get started? Kitty Pride ( aka shadowcat ) returns to the mansion.

seasons.name: Dangerous
seasons.overview: The tragic death of a student at the Xavier Institute reveals that a powerful enemy is working from inside the mansion to destroy the X-Men; an enemy that knows all of their weaknesses and can predict their every move.

seasons.name: Torn
seasons.overview: They're back! The chart-topping super-team of Joss Whedon and John Cassaday return for more Astonshing X-Men! If you thought their past efforts were full of shocks and surprises, hold onto your eyeballs - because you haven't seen anything yet, as things go from peculiar to just plain bizarre! Emma Frost's erratic behavior has the X-Men spinning in a non-stop downward spiral. Will an unlikely union be the final straw? After secretly lying in wait for months, the new Hellfire Club makes its move! Plus: The X-Man destined to destroy the Breakworld stands revealed! Who is it, and what will be their fate?

seasons.name: Unstoppable
seasons.overview: Strap yourselves in, folks! It's Joss Whedon and John Cassaday's final arc on Astonishing X-Men! After the shocking and brain-smashing events of recent issues, the X-Men are off to protect the Earth from its destruction at the hands of the Breakworld. And when it's all over, nothing will ever be the same! No, really, we mean it! Whedon and Cassaday prove they are more than Astonishing: They are unstoppable!

episodes.name: Gifted Chapter 01
episodes.overview: Cyclops and Emma Frost re-form the X-Men with the express purpose of "astonishing" the world. But when breaking news regarding a cure to the mutant gene unexpectedly hits the airwaves, will it derail their new plans before they even get started? Kitty Pride ( aka shadowcat ) returns to the mansion.

episodes.name: Gifted Chapter 02
episodes.overview: The X-Men confront the deadly Ord, Kitty Pryde faces off with Emma Frost and the mutant cure divides the team!

episodes.name: Gifted Chapter 03
episodes.overview: Cyclops pays a visit to Nick Fury while the debate over the mutant cure brings Wolverine and Beast claw-to-claw!

episodes.name: Gifted Chapter 04
episodes.overview: The X-Men storm Benetech and you'll never believe what Kitty finds in the basement! Plus, with the team away, Ord invades the Xavier Institute!

episodes.name: Gifted Chapter 05
episodes.overview: Colossus returns as the X-Men go to war with Ord and the power behind the mutant cure!

episodes.name: Gifted Chapter 06
episodes.overview: Ord makes his final move to take down mutantkind and only the combined powers of S.H.I.E.L.D., S.W.O.R.D. and the X-Men can stop him!

episodes.name: Torn Chapter 1
episodes.overview: They're back! The chart-topping super-team of Joss Whedon and John Cassaday return for more Astonshing X-Men! If you thought their past efforts were full of shocks and surprises, hold onto your eyeballs - because you haven't seen anything yet, as things go from peculiar to just plain bizarre! Emma Frost's erratic behavior has the X-Men spinning in a non-stop downward spiral. Will an unlikely union be the final straw? After secretly lying in wait for months, the new Hellfire Club makes its move! Plus: The X-Man destined to destroy the Breakworld stands revealed! Who is it, and what will be their fate?
